== Luciole Feature Wishlist ==

The wishlist is organized by categories

=== Gui Wishlist ===
* Add fullscren mode
* Drag and drop between images and trash
* Loop video playback
* Add mounted video duration   

=== Acquisition Wishlist ===
* Enhanced onion skin ( on several images )
* Capture imaged on png format 

=== Mounting WishList ===
* On montage view add possibility to 'multiply an image' . Right button click on an image propose : multiply image by #value'
* Increase precision of framerate. Clear  differentiation of framerate due to video format( ex PAL DV), and image/frame precision
* Add a sound track 
* Ability to hold snapshots for a specified amount of frames
* Snapshots should be inserted into montage area after the selected snapshot, and not at the bottom

=== Project wishlist ===
* Add support for NTSC format ( rate and image size )
* Arbitrary framerate

=== Export Wishlist ===

* 2 philosophies on tool export (timeline) : export as a single video or all images. copy images  used for the tool in another directory
 
=== Import WishList ===
* allow import of png images
